Articles.Content:
Geneva Convention? More like Geneva Suggestion.

Re-Militarized Hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2023-08-24T18:23:11Z" title="08/24/2023 06:23  PM" data-short="Aug 24">August 24, 2023</time> by TwoCalories**
  
What is this new page? How did it get here?

The hill is located on the 38th parallel.

De-Militarized Zone Hill

Mill refined wheat.

Giant hill made of grain.

> 
> 
> On 8/25/2023 at 11:00 AM, Space Kerbalisation Tech said:
> 
> 
> The hill is located on the 38th parallel.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> De-Militarized Zone Hill
> 

i missed the opportunity to say “hill with binoculars” or something.

Anyway,

The grain is washed away by the rain.

anti-gravity hill (rain-grain=-g)

A whole team of scientists arrive at the -G hill, and start running experiments like crazy.

Scientist hill.

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Nazalassa said:
> 
> 
> ~~Bob Kerman Hill~~
> 

*Akkermann Cement* Hill.

Spoiler

![main-intro-slide-1.jpg](https://www.akkermann.ru/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/main-intro-slide-1.jpg)

You get a delivery of blue metal and water.

A great big Concrete Hill.

The concrete grows cracks.

Plant Hill.

The plant is growing.

Tree Hill

And growing.

It has many names, but for simplicity,

The Tree of Life.

The tree is cut by some cuboids flying in very close formation.

Steve Hill

The power goes out, the internet cannot be accessed.

A hill of people finally notice the world around them.
